item.title: Test document
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information In order to reset the software but keep inventory, you will need to first export the current inventory, run the script to reset the software and import the inventory. Export the inventory from RPT_ITM_N: Select f01, f64 from RPT_ITM_N Where F1034 = 8501 Save the records into a *.csv file. To reset the system, […]

item.title: How to Manage Urgent Host Messages
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information This document describes host errors that are reported as urgent messages. The host errors are related to the management and the operations of the host. They are intended for people who are configuring the host, the connection of the stores with the host, the item imports the host balancing (with the stores) and any […]

item.title: SQL Server Best Practices and Performance Issues
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information This document provides technical guidance about best practices for maintaining the LOC SMS databases on a SQL server instance. The goal of this document is to provide a list of summarized best practices. Configuration at Head Office In order to maximize SQL performance, it is desirable to configure TempDB with a reasonable minimum size […]

item.title: Issue With Installs on Windows 8.1 or Windows Server 2012 R2
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information There is a known issue when the software is installed on Windows 8.1 or Windows Server 2012 R2. A failure can occur when registering TBarCode11_xXX.ocx, even after successfully installing vcredist_XX.exe. This problem often occurs when Windows Update is not set to keep the operating system up-to-date and/or KB2999226 is often installed out of order. […]
